ITEM.TEXT: Requested size of bloc counted in weight unit if provided
Maximum memory size task might use

ITEM.SOURCE:
` DATA run_id TYPE td_process_id.
super->constructor( run_id ).
IF categories IS BOUND. me->set_category( categories ). ENDIF. IF status IS BOUND. me->set_status( status ). ENDIF. me->set_thread_count( thread_count ). me->set_bloc_size( bloc_size ). me->set_weight_fn( weight_fn ). me->set_max_memory( max_memory ).
